verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: major pharmaceutical companies will announce voluntary cuts in drug prices in two weeks] .
President Donald Trump said Wednesday major pharmaceutical companies [V: will] announce voluntary cuts in drug prices in two weeks .
President Donald Trump said Wednesday [ARG0: major pharmaceutical companies] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARG1: voluntary cuts in drug prices] [ARGM-TMP: in two weeks] .
